title: Multiplying the Numerator and Denominator
text: We can multiply the numerator and denominators to get $$\frac{2x\left(x^2-9\right)}{\left(x^2-7x+12\right) 6x^2}$$
speech: We can multiply the numerator and denominators to get  fraction, 2 x, parentheses, x squared minus 9, , over, parentheses, x squared minus 7 x plus 12  times 6 x squared,

title: Simplifying if Necessary
text: This fraction can be simplified through factoring. $$\frac{2x\left(x+3\right) \left(x-3\right)}{\left(x-4\right) \left(x-3\right) 6x^2}=\frac{x\left(x+3\right)}{x-4} 3x^2$$
speech: This fraction can be simplified through factoring.  fraction, 2 x, parentheses x plus 3,  times, parentheses x minus 3, , over, parentheses x minus 4,  times, parentheses x minus 3,  times 6 x squared,  is equal to fraction, x, parentheses x plus 3, , over, x minus 4,  3 x squared
